pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Tea Tree And Manuka Honey Clay Mask 100g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Tea Tree and Manuka Honey Clay Mask for oily, acne-prone skin.

A natural clay mask specifically formulated for oily and acne-prone skin. Tea Tree Oil clears blackheads and removes acne-causing impurities, whilst Kaolin Clay absorbs and controls excess oil. Manuka Honey helps reduce the appearance of acne scars and soothes skin redness.

Suitable For: Oily, acne-prone skin.

Product Claims: Free from: contains no petrolatum, mineral oils, phthalates, artificial colours or fragrances, synthetic parabens, SLS or SLES. Product not tested on animals.

Size: 100g

Scent: Tea Tree & Manuka Honey

Non-Comedogenic?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Oily

Skin Condition: Breakouts

Shelf Life in Days: 1095

Alcohol Free?: n/a

KEY FEATURES

• Clear blackheads and remove impurities
• Absorb and control excess oil
• Reduce the appearance of acne scars
• Formulated with 100% Pure Australian-grown Tea Tree Oil
• Product not tested on animals

Warnings

If sensitivity occurs, discontinue use. Avoid contact with eyes. Do not apply to broken skin. Keep out of reach of children.

CAUTION

For external use only. Skin patch test prior to use.

Ingredients

Water, Kaolin, Tapioca Starch, Glycerin, Bentonite (Clay), Charcoal Powder, Phenoxyethanol, Manuka Honey, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Xanthan Gum, Backhousia Citriodora (Lemon Myrtle) Leaf Extract, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Betaine Salicylate, Colloidal Oatmeal, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Allantoin, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Myroxylon Pereirae (Balsam Peru) Oil, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Lactate, Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Root Extract, Chamomilla Recutita (Matricaria) Flower Extract, Undaria Pinnatifida (Seaweed) Extract, Citric Acid, Lactic Acid, Contains Limonene.

Contains: Contains Limonene.

Directions

Gently cleanse the skin, removing any make-up. Apply the mask using finger tips, being careful to avoid the eye area. Leave on the skin for 5-10 minutes and rinse using warm water. For a deeper cleanse, remove the mask using warm water and a face cloth.

USAGE ADVICE

For best results, cleanse skin with Thursday Plantation Tea Tree Face Wash for Acne prior to the mask, and hydrate with Tea Tree Face Cream after application.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
